title: MacUser UK sez Typographer.org is one of top 50 Mac sites
content:
UK magazine MacUser's cover story is _Secret Mac sites -- 50 hottest web links that will keep you ahead of the crowd._ This morning I received a message that Typographer.org is in the list. Apparently they moaned that Bald Condensed doesn't get updated as often (heck it's been over a year! :^( ). (I've been hunting high and low for a copy of the mag but can't find it anywhere in Gent. Could somebody please make a scan of the relevant page and send it to me -- I'd really like to see that. Thanks.)  
I finally managed to obtain a copy of the mag, so it's not necessary anymore.
author: Bald Condensed
